Message:
To be precise, though,
that lady and I both
won the contest.

But, everyone was so excited,
saying that having two winners
made this year full of happiness.

“Your story really
warmed up my heart.
Thank you.”
...Hehehe♪

I have Big Sis to
thank for everything.
I mean, the very thought
of her fills my heart
with so much warmth.

I want her to be happy.
I want her to keep smiling.
And...

Hehe! I’ll tell her
the rest in person.

In any case, this yarn
really is just like Big Sis.
With its gentle, soothing color.

She always protects me
with her kindness,
and this time, I’ll...

I’ll weave every “Thank you”
and “I love you” into this scarf...

and use it to wrap you up
in one biiig hug, Big Sis!
